name: Squirrels Collecting Nuts While Flying Through the Air Dodging Pigeons [Question Mark(?)] Please Help Him.
name_original: Squirrels Collecting Nuts While Flying Through the Air Dodging Pigeons [Question Mark(?)] Please Help Him.
description:
You jump, you glide, you soar!

Play as a squirrel, get back to your home with as many nuts as possible, and avoid those nasty heurgh birds.

Credits

Dev Manager, Game Development & Design, Music - Brendan Larson

Game Development and Level Design - Joey Burss

Game Development and Sound Effects, Spit Birds - Kayleigh Callaway

Sheriff - Level Design - Kenley Smith

Game Development and Level Design - Collin DIekvoss

Lead Artist - Haley Peterson

Other Artwork - Chloe Meyer, Doug Fred
